'''16w44a''' is the fourteenth and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.11]], released on November 3, 2016 which fixes bugs.<ref name="blogpost 16w44a">https://www.mojang.com/2016/11/minecraft-snapshot-16w44a/</ref>

== Changes ==
'''[[Sneaking]] '''
* Now prevents drops from heights of more than 0.6 blocks; previously, it was 1 full block or greater.
